name: Maker's Legacy
description:
Plays best in full screen

Maker's Legacy is a turn based tactical game. Control fleets of ships by choosing abilities and setting maneuvers, then watch them carry out your orders.

The game is player in a series of turns, each turn is 3 seconds long where the ships will fly and shoot according to their orders. Between turns you can issue new orders.

Check out Galpedia from the main menu for ship, weapon, and upgrade stats and information.

Controls

Ships are controlled though the command pane on the left side of the screen. Select a maneuver from the maneuver grid, select an ability, then click the checkbox to mark the ship as "done".

You can click the End Turn button at any time to end the turn immediately. Any un-ordered ships will simply fly straight ahead.
